pageTitle: School board weighed difficult choices | ColumbineCourier.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {32939=Copyright © 2015, 26471=Columbine Courier | circulation@columbinecourier.com | 303-350-1030 5808 S Rapp St, Suite 119, Littleton, CO 80120 Office Hours are 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, 20641=The Jeffco school board took serious actions on Jan. 14 related to managing school facility capacity. The district’s student population has steadied at about 80,000-plus kids, and students “choicing” in and out of neighborhood schools have affected the numbers of kids at different schools.}
